text:
Netflix | https://jobs.netflix.com/ | Data Engineers | Los Gatos, CA | Full-Time | Onsite

Embrace our unique culture at Netflix (https://jobs.netflix.com/culture)

Stack: varies slightly depending on teams to solve unique problems

For information on the data engineering team aligned with providing Netflix subscribers with the highest quality video streaming experience, view the team overview (http://bit.ly/h1r3m3)

Apply here: https://jobs.netflix.com/search?q=data%20engineer
